project_name.justification: The text announces the acquisition of the project: "C2C Metals Corp. Announces Acquisition of the Melinda Uranium Property Update" and refers to it as "the Melinda Uranium Project in Utah."

company_name.justification: The acquiring company at the time of the announcement was C2C Metals Corp. However, a subsequent news release indicates a name change: "C2C Metals Announces Change of Name to Urano Energy Corp.". This aligns with the authoritative metadata provided.

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the acquiring company, C2C Metals Corp., is identified in the text: "Chris Huggins, Chief Executive Officer, stated:"

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The acquisition was through staking, which typically implies 100% interest, but the text does not explicitly state the percentage acquired.

primary_commodity.justification: The text describes the project as a uranium project: "acquisition of its first United States uranium project, through staking of the Melinda Uranium Project in Utah."

verified_article_link.justification: No article link was provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The acquisition was made through staking, and no financial transaction details or currency are mentioned in the text.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The acquisition was made through staking, not a purchase, so no cash payment was involved. The text states the acquisition was "through staking of the Melinda Uranium Project".

share_payments_raw.justification: The acquisition was made through staking, not a purchase, so no share payment was involved. The text states the acquisition was "through staking of the Melinda Uranium Project".

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The acquisition was made through staking, not a purchase, so no combined payment was involved. The text states the acquisition was "through staking of the Melinda Uranium Project".

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The acquisition was made through staking, and no shares were issued as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: The acquisition was made through staking, and no shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions a planned drill program but does not specify a commitment in terms of meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions a planned drill program but does not specify a monetary exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: There is no mention of a Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR) in the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states the project size: "the Melinda Project includes 240 claims covering 8 (eight) square miles."

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text specifies the unit for the coverage area: "the Melinda Project includes 240 claims covering 8 (eight) square miles."

resource_size.justification: The text explicitly states that the historical data cannot be relied upon and does not constitute a current resource: "A Qualified Person (as defined in NI 43-101) has not done sufficient work to verify the historical drilling data... C2C is not treating the historical data as current and it should not be relied upon."

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The authoritative metadata provides UE and CSE. The buyer, C2C Metals Corp. (CSE: CTOC), announced a name change to Urano Energy Corp., which corresponds to the new ticker, as seen in the list of other company news.
